project.name: sipxopenfire-config
project.description: Ant task file for database operations.

target.name: create
target.description: creates the schema for the database

target.name: check
target.sipx-sql: select version from ofVersion where name='openfire';

target.name: setdomain
target.echo: DELETE FROM ofProperty where name='xmpp.domain'; INSERT INTO ofProperty (name, propValue) VALUES ('xmpp.domain','${domain}');

target.name: setfqdn
target.echo: DELETE FROM ofProperty where name='xmpp.fqdn'; INSERT INTO ofProperty (name, propValue) VALUES ('xmpp.fqdn','${fqdn}');

target.name: setup
